arts.ttl: Wrexham close in on third straight promotion
arts.sum: Wrexham strengthened their position for automatic promotion to the English League Championship with a 3-0 win against Burton Albion on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Wrexham strengthen grip on second place after overcoming 10-man Burton
arts.sum: Steven Fletcher, Sam Smith and Jack Marriott netted for the promotion hopefuls.

arts.ttl: ‘Very similar’ – Stockport County compared to Wrexham by League One boss
arts.sum: Stockport County’s rise up the football pyramid has been ‘very similar’ to Wrexham’s, Exeter City boss Gary Caldwell… The post ‘Very similar’ – Stockport County compared to Wrexham by League One boss appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Wrexham appoint four new board members
arts.sum: Wrexham have added four new members to their board of directors, taking the total number of directors at the League One side to nine.

arts.ttl: Preview: Wrexham vs. Burton Albion - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Wrexham and Burton Albion, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo tipped to partner Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney in new Wrexham ownership
arts.sum: Wrexham have been tipped to enjoy even more success if Cristiano Ronaldo buys into the League One club alongside current owners Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney

arts.ttl: Wrexham 'could be bought by Cristiano Ronaldo' - and keep Ryan Reynolds involved
arts.sum: Global superstar Cristiano Ronaldo has been tipped to become involved in League One side Wrexham when he retires alongside Hollywood stars Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney
